snippet: A scorching heat wave has gripped Egypt this week, killing at least 42 people, including a German man.
abstract: Heat wave bakes Egypt with temperatures reaching 111 degrees; at least 42 people have died.
lead_paragraph: A scorching heat wave has gripped Egypt this week, killing at least 42 people, including a German man.

headline.main: Egypt: Dozens Die as Temperatures Reach 111 Degrees
headline.print_headline: Middle East: Egypt: Dozens Die as Temperatures Reach 111 Degrees
